articles.content: After three months since its premiere, Zee TV’s 'Sa Re Ga Ma Pa 2023' came to an end on Sunday, November 26, with a grand finale. Albert Kabo Lepcha from Kalimpong, West Bengal, was announced as the … [+4821 chars]

articles.title: Ektaa Kapoor shows off her Emmy award at Mumbai airport as she returns from NYC - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ektaa Kapoor returned to India on Monday after the International Emmy Awards. The event was held in New York City. | Bollywood
articles.content: Film producer Ektaa Kapoor is back in India after attending the 51st International Emmy Awards in New York City. On Monday morning, she was snapped arriving at the Mumbai airport with her Emmy award.… [+2293 chars]
